channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Lola Young Collapses Mid-Set at All Things Go NYC Festival
item.description: Sending love and good vibes to Lola Young after a powerful performance at All Things Go NYC Festival! 🌟💖 #StayStrongLola #MusicNews

item.title: Selena Gomez & Benny Blanco Are Married
item.description: "Pop music's latest power couple: Selena Gomez & Benny Blanco tied the knot! 💍🎉 Let's dance to their love tunes! 💕 #MusicNews"

item.title: How to Watch Big Brother UK From Anywhere in the World
item.description: 🌍 Unlock the ultimate Big Brother UK experience no matter where you are! 📺🎉 #GlobalViewingParty 🎶 #BigBrotherUK

item.title: Turnstile’s “NEVER ENOUGH TOUR” Is All About Hardcore, Love, and Hardcore Lovers: Review + Photos
item.description: 🤘🖤 Dive into the hardcore love affair with Turnstile on their “NEVER ENOUGH TOUR”! Check out our review and photos now! #HardcoreLovers #TurnstileTour

item.title: Paul McCartney Launches 2025 North American Tour with First Performance of “Help!” in 35 Years
item.description: 🎸 Paul McCartney rocks our world with a new tour and a classic hit making a comeback! 🙌 #PaulMcCartney #MusicLegend
